mods.note: This newspaper clipping describes activities of the school, such as providing hot cereal with cream and sugar during cold weather, intended to provide for the children and so that the children will "realize the value of co-operative planning and living." Additionally, students learned what it meant to be an American citizen, including the duty in war time to "take care of all materials, get along with less, avoid spreading rumors, buy War Bonds and Stamps, help in Salvage campaigns, practice personal safety and follow health rules."
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
